title: AGI Breakthrough
summary: First verified instance of Artificial General Intelligence.
why: Machines can now perform any intellectual task a human can.
market_analysis: Global markets halt trading due to volatility. Capital flows aggressively into compute infrastructure and energy sectors.
stockReaction: Global markets halt trading due to volatility.

title: Solid-State Pilot Lines
summary: Major automakers launch pilot production for solid-state batteries.
why: The 'Holy Grail' of batteries: lighter, safer, and 2x range compared to Lithium-Ion.
market_analysis: Battery startups (QuantumScape) and legacy auto stocks fluctuate on prototype results. Reduced reliance on lithium drives commodity market shifts.
stockReaction: Battery startups (QuantumScape) and legacy auto stocks fluctuate on prototype results.

title: Agentic AI
summary: AI shifts from 'Chatbots' to 'Agents' that perform complex tasks autonomously.
why: Transforms AI from a conversational tool to a workforce tool.
market_analysis: Cloud infrastructure stocks (AMZN, MSFT) rally on compute demand. Labor markets begin adjusting to AI automation.
stockReaction: Cloud infrastructure stocks (AMZN, MSFT) rally on compute demand.

title: Tesla "We, Robot"
summary: Tesla unveils Cybercab and Optimus Gen 3 updates.
why: Signals full pivot to robotics over traditional cars.
market_analysis: High volatility in TSLA as market debates timeline. Robotics investments surge globally.
stockReaction: High volatility in TSLA as market debates timeline.

title: Claude 3 Launch
summary: Anthropic releases Claude 3 (Opus), surpassing GPT-4.
why: Ended OpenAI monopoly on top-tier reasoning.
market_analysis: GOOG and MSFT adjusted as AI race became a three-way battle. Increased competition drives innovation in AI safety.
stockReaction: GOOG and MSFT adjusted as AI race became a three-way battle.

title: Figure 01 Demo
summary: Figure AI robot holds conversation and performs tasks.
why: First convincing demo of LLM-brained humanoid.
market_analysis: Sparked massive VC investment in robotics. Accelerates humanoid robot development.
stockReaction: Sparked massive VC investment in robotics.

title: Gemini 1.5 Pro
summary: Google launches 1-million token context window.
why: Allowed AI to read entire books/codebases at once.
market_analysis: Alphabet (GOOG) rallied on technical leadership. Boosts productivity in software development.
stockReaction: Alphabet (GOOG) rallied on technical leadership.

title: Optimus Gen 2
summary: Tesla reveals faster, lighter Optimus Gen 2.
why: Demonstrated rapid hardware iteration.
market_analysis: Reinforced Tesla robotics narrative. Advances in humanoid robotics for manufacturing.
stockReaction: Reinforced Tesla robotics narrative.

title: Robotaxis 24/7
summary: SF approves 24/7 paid driverless rides.
why: Commercial validation of Level 4 autonomy.
market_analysis: Waymo solidified lead; Uber/Lyft partnerships followed. Accelerates autonomous vehicle adoption.
stockReaction: Waymo solidified lead; Uber/Lyft partnerships followed.

title: ChatGPT Launch
summary: OpenAI releases ChatGPT to the public.
why: The 'iPhone Moment' for AI.
market_analysis: Triggered multi-trillion dollar AI bull market. Democratized AI access globally.
stockReaction: Triggered multi-trillion dollar AI bull market.

title: Sodium-Ion Battery
summary: CATL unveils Sodium-Ion tech.
why: Reduces reliance on scarce lithium.
market_analysis: CATL stock surged; raw material markets shifted. Lowers battery costs for EVs.
stockReaction: CATL stock surged; raw material markets shifted.

title: Apple M1 Chip
summary: Apple shifts Macs to custom Silicon.
why: Revolutionized laptop efficiency.
market_analysis: Apple margins rose; Intel declined. Boosts ARM-based computing adoption.
stockReaction: Apple margins rose; Intel declined.

title: Li-Ion Commercialized
summary: Sony commercializes the Lithium-Ion battery.
why: Enabled the portable electronics revolution (laptops, phones).
market_analysis: Fueled the consumer electronics boom of the 90s. Created global lithium demand.
stockReaction: Fueled the consumer electronics boom of the 90s.

title: Backpropagation
summary: Hinton et al. popularize backprop for training neural nets.
why: The mathematical foundation of modern Deep Learning.
market_analysis: Academic breakthrough; laid groundwork for future AI stocks. Enabled scalable ML training.
stockReaction: Academic breakthrough; laid groundwork for future AI stocks.

title: MYCIN Expert System
summary: An AI designed to diagnose bacterial infections.
why: Proved AI could mimic human expert decision making.
market_analysis: Boosted interest in symbolic AI research funding. Pioneered expert systems in medicine.
stockReaction: Boosted interest in symbolic AI research funding.

title: Intel 4004
summary: The first commercially available microprocessor.
why: Shrunk computers from rooms to desktops.
market_analysis: Launched the Silicon Valley semiconductor era. Enabled personal computing revolution.
stockReaction: Launched the Silicon Valley semiconductor era.

title: Shakey the Robot
summary: The first general-purpose mobile robot able to reason.
why: Combined robotics, computer vision, and planning.
market_analysis: Funded largely by DARPA; military/research impact. Foundation for autonomous robotics.
stockReaction: Funded largely by DARPA; military/research impact.

title: Fuzzy Logic
summary: Lotfi Zadeh introduces Fuzzy Logic.
why: Allowed computers to handle ambiguous data ("somewhat hot").
market_analysis: Widely adopted later in industrial control systems. Improved automation in appliances.
stockReaction: Widely adopted later in industrial control systems.

title: Perceptron & LISP
summary: Rosenblatt invents the Perceptron; McCarthy creates LISP.
why: Hardware for learning and software for reasoning.
market_analysis: N/A (Academic Era). Laid foundations for neural networks and programming languages.
stockReaction: N/A (Academic Era)

title: Dartmouth Conference
summary: The term "Artificial Intelligence" is coined.
why: The official birth of AI as a research field.
market_analysis: N/A (Academic Era). Sparked global AI research investments.
stockReaction: N/A (Academic Era)

title: Unimate Robot
summary: First programmable industrial robot patent.
why: The grandfather of all factory automation.
market_analysis: Revolutionized GM assembly lines in the 60s. Enabled mass manufacturing automation.
stockReaction: Revolutionized GM assembly lines in the 60s.

title: Turing Test
summary: Alan Turing proposes the "Imitation Game".
why: Defined the ultimate goal of machine intelligence.
market_analysis: N/A. Influenced AI development and ethical discussions.
stockReaction: N/A

title: Cybernetics
summary: Norbert Wiener publishes "Cybernetics".
why: Established the study of control and communication in machines.
market_analysis: N/A. Influenced control systems and AI theory.
stockReaction: N/A

title: The Transistor
summary: Bell Labs invents the point-contact transistor.
why: Replaced vacuum tubes; made modern tech possible.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: Infinite. Created the Digital Age. Enabled miniaturization of electronics.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: Infinite. Created the Digital Age.

title: ENIAC
summary: First general-purpose electronic computer.
why: Demonstrated massive speed for calculation.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: Shifted military/science to digital. Pioneered programmable computing.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: Shifted military/science to digital.

title: Neural Networks
summary: McCulloch & Pitts model artificial neurons.
why: The theoretical ancestor of modern Deep Learning.
market_analysis: N/A. Foundation for modern AI and machine learning.
stockReaction: N/A

title: Analytical Engine
summary: Babbage designs the first general mechanical computer.
why: The Victorian ancestor of the modern CPU.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: None at the time (it wasn't built). Influenced mechanical computing concepts.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: None at the time (it wasn't built).

title: Electric Light
summary: Edison commercializes the light bulb.
why: Built the grid infrastructure we plug robots into today.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: Created the Utility Industry. Extended working hours and productivity.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: Created the Utility Industry.

title: The Telegraph
summary: Morse demonstrates long-distance communication.
why: The 'Victorian Internet'; precursor to data networks.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: Globalization of information. Accelerated trade and news dissemination.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: Globalization of information.

title: Electric Motor
summary: Faraday builds the first electric motor.
why: Provided the muscle (actuation) for future robots.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: Electrification of industry. Enabled mechanical automation.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: Electrification of industry.

title: Voltaic Pile
summary: Alessandro Volta invents the first battery.
why: Enabled portable electric power for the first time.
market_analysis: Economic Impact: The birth of Electrochemistry. Foundation for all modern batteries.
stockReaction: Economic Impact: The birth of Electrochemistry.

title: Bessemer Process
summary: Henry Bessemer patents the first process for mass-producing steel.
why: Enabled cheap, strong steel for railways, buildings, and machinery.
market_analysis: Lowered the cost of steel production by 80%, enabling the railroad boom and modern skyscrapers.
stockReaction: Carnegie Steel became the world's most profitable company.
